title: The Prodigal
description: Martin is twenty-one, an age not worth lying about. He's been happily doing nothing, claiming to be a professional online Poker player. But now, he's facing a life away from the corrupting influence of overwhelming privilege.In lean, distinct prose, punctuated with unpredictable typography, Alexander J. Allison's first novel is a humorous, sharp and fresh look at the things that make living better than dying. Or not, whatever.
author: Alexander J. Allison
